amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 116-392 to require that pre-election hearings before the National Labor Relations Board (NLRB) are conducted on a day-to-day basis.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 116-392 to require that pre-election hearings before the National Labor Relations Board (NLRB) are conducted on a day-to-day basis.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norcross amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Norcross.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norcross amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
